item.text: Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, we must get rid of every weight and the sin that clings so closely, and run with endurance the race set out for us,

keeping our eyes fixed on Jesus, the pioneer and perfecter of our faith. For the joy set out for him he endured the cross, disregarding its shame, and has taken his seat at the right hand of the throne of God.

<st data-num="357" class="">Think</st> of him who <st data-num="5278" class="">endured</st> <st data-num="5108" class="">such</st> <st data-num="485" class="">opposition</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2577">grow weary</st> in <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">souls</st> and <st data-num="1590">give up</st>.

You have <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="478" class="">resisted</st> <st data-num="3360">to the point</st> of <st data-num="129" class="">bloodshed</st><n id="1" /> in your <st data-num="464" class="">struggle</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.

And have you forgotten the exhortation addressed to you as sons?

“My son, do not scorn the Lord’s discipline

or give up when he corrects you.
For the Lord disciplines the one he loves and chastises every son he accepts.”
Endure your suffering as discipline; God is treating you as sons. For what son is there that a father does not discipline?

<st data-num="1534" class="">Besides</st>, we <st data-num="2192">have</st> experienced <st data-num="3810" class="">discipline</st> from<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">earthly</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="1788" class="">respected</st> them; shall we <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5293" class="">submit</st> ourselves <st data-num="4183">all</st> the <st data-num="3123">more</st> to the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> of <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><st data-num="2198"> receive life</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they <st data-num="3811" class="">disciplined</st> us <st data-num="4314">for</st> a <st data-num="3641">little</st> <st data-num="2250">while</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1380">seemed good</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> he does so <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> our <st data-num="4851" class="">benefit</st>, that we may <st data-num="3335" class="">share</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="41" class="">holiness</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3809" class="">discipline</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">seems</st> <st data-num="3077" class="">painful</st> <st data-num="4314">at</st> the <st data-num="3918" class="">time</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joyful</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5306">later</st> it <st data-num="591" class="">produces</st> the <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> of <st data-num="1516" class="">peace</st> and <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st><n id="2" /> for those <st data-num="1128" class="">trained</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.
Therefore, strengthen your listless hands and your weak knees,
and make straight paths for your feet, so that what is lame may not be put out of joint but be healed.
Pursue peace with everyone, and holiness, for without it no one will see the Lord.
See to it that no one comes short of the grace of God, that no one be like a bitter root springing up and causing trouble, and through it many become defiled.
And see to it that no one becomes an immoral or godless person like Esau, who sold his own birthright for a single meal.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1492">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3347" class="">later</st> when he <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> the <st data-num="2129">blessing</st>, he was <st data-num="593" class="">rejected</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">opportunity</st> for <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>, <st data-num="2539" class="">although</st> he <st data-num="1567" class="">sought</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">blessing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1144" class="">tears</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">come to</st> something that can be <st data-num="5584" class="">touched</st>,<n id="1" /> to a <st data-num="2545" class="">burning</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1105">darkness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2217">gloom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2366" class="">whirlwind</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2279" class="">blast</st> of a <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="4487">uttering words</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739">such that</st> those who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3868" class="">begged</st> to <st data-num="3056" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="3361">no</st> <st data-num="4369" class="">more</st>.<n id="2" />
For they could not bear what was commanded: “If even an animal touches the mountain, it must be stoned.”
In fact, the scene was so terrifying that Moses said, “I shudder with fear.”

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> you have <st data-num="4334" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="4622" class="">Zion</st>, the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, the <st data-num="2032" class="">heavenly</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3461" class="">myriads</st> of <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, to the <st data-num="3841">assembly</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">congregation</st> of the <st data-num="4416" class="">firstborn</st>, who are <st data-num="583" class="">enrolled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, the <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> of the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>, who have been <st data-num="5048">made perfect</st>,
and to Jesus, the mediator of a new covenant, and to the sprinkled blood that speaks of something better than Abel’s does.
Take care not to refuse the one who is speaking! For if they did not escape when they refused the one who warned them on earth, how much less shall we, if we reject the one who warns from heaven?
Then his voice shook the earth, but now he has promised, “I will once more shake not only the earth but heaven too.”
Now this phrase “once more” indicates the removal of what is shaken, that is, of created things, so that what is unshaken may remain.

<st data-num="1352" class="">So</st> since we are <st data-num="3880" class="">receiving</st> an <st data-num="761" class="">unshakable</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>, let us <st data-num="2192" class="">give</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">thanks</st>, and <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">this</st> let us <st data-num="3000" class="">offer worship</st> <st data-num="2102" class="">pleasing</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2124" class="">devotion</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> awe.
For our God is indeed a devouring fire.
